entry.title: A Python2 developer's Python3 development challenge
entry.summary:
Description

A developer who used Python2 8 years ago shares his vivid experience of developing using Python3 in 2023 and four new features of Python3 that he learned.

Daniel Lee I love development stories. I am interested in all topics related to the web, backend, frontend, and development culture. I â€¦
entry.content:
Description

A developer who used Python2 8 years ago shares his vivid experience of developing using Python3 in 2023 and four new features of Python3 that he learned.

Daniel Lee I love development stories. I am interested in all topics related to the web, backend, frontend, and development culture. I am currently working as a developer at Google in San Francisco, USA.
